commit message: Hide the cropt rect when the screenshot is taken so the dots wont be on the screen.
Updated support library and use vector drawables.
Replaced all icons with svg icons. Also use clearer icons for the sleep timer.
Fixed issue that remote control client was not addressed correctly
Use a simple kotlin object for the logstorage.
Refactored app class and moved logging to own package.
Use a setting in prefsManager for acra.
Removed log gathering in production mode.

Distinct the position based on the second.

This has two advantages.
One: The second displayed is always accurate, even at higher speed.
Two: This largely reduces object allocations as (for normal speed) 5x less objects are being created based upon the emission.
Fixed landscape player layout for larger phones.
